prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon that resembles a round, smiling ball with expressive eyes.
I want a playful Pokemon with a shiny metallic finish and an energetic personality.
Generate a Pokemon that is spherical in shape and emits electricity when excited.
Make a cute, round Pokemon with a cheerful face and a powerful electric attack.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a big electric orb with a mischievous grin.
Design a Pokemon that is known for its shocking abilities and has a glossy exterior.
Show me a small, spherical Pokemon with a bright smile and a knack for causing explosions.
